text50: The Espoir Blurry Cheek in shade 03 Lower Rosy from the Disney collaboration is an absolute delight from both a design and performance standpoint the packaging is whimsical and collectible with subtle Disney elements that donâ€™t feel childish but rather nostalgic and charming the compact is lightweight yet sturdy with a built-in mirror that adds practicality especially when on the go the shade Lower Rosy is a muted dusty rose with soft mauve undertones a perfect everyday color that adds a natural flush to the cheeks without being overpowering what makes this blush stand out is its unique blurry texture it has a silky soft matte finish that diffuses beautifully into the skin giving a blurred airbrushed look itâ€™s not powdery or chalky but instead blends seamlessly even over base makeup without disturbing foundation or concealer the pigmentation is moderate and buildable making it easy to apply even for beginners you can go in with a light hand for a subtle rosy tint or layer it for a more defined cheek without it ever looking patchy or heavy the finish is matte but not flat it has a soft focus effect that makes the skin look smooth and refined while controlling excess shine without emphas
